DEVOTION: The act or state of devoting or being devoted.
DRIVE: Motivation to do or achieve something; ability coupled with ambition.
FIRE: A (usually self-sustaining) chemical reaction involving the bonding of oxygen with carbon or other fuel, with the production of heat and the presence of flame or smouldering.
PASSION: Any great, strong, powerful emotion, especially romantic love or extreme hate.
PURPOSE: An objective to be reached; a target; an aim; a goal.
